sentence: Speaking to the Fox network on Sunday, Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) revealed that the Republican Party campaign strategy for the 2022 midterms will be all about former President Donald Trump.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Jim Jordan: The GOP's ultimate goal in taking back Congress is to 'frame up' a win for Trump in 2024

sentence: Democrats have long claimed to be against gerrymandering, but they have no issue with the partisan redrawing of congressional districts when it suits them, according to Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio.
author: Eric Mack
title: Rep. Jordan: Redistricting 'Only Gerrymandering' When GOP Does It

sentence: Democrats often cry foul on alleged Republican gerrymandering, but they are silent as they engage in similar conduct on a larger scale, Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, said this week on "Life, Liberty & Levin."
title: Jim Jordan: Gerrymandering apparently only exists when GOP does it

sentence: “In other words, the Democrats are better at being scoundrels than Republicans and Republicans better wake the hell up.” Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) then said Democrats are frequently hypocritical when it comes to the issue of gerrymandering.
author: Katherine Huggins
title: Mark Levin Claims Democrats Are ‘Better at Being Scoundrels’ Than GOP at Gerrymandering: ‘Republicans Better Wake the Hell Up’

author: John Amato
title: Jim Jordan Is An Absurd Hypocrite, Part Infinity

sentence: He also condemned the Republican National Committee's decision to censure Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois – the only two GOP lawmakers on the Jan. 6 select House committee after Democrats refused to seat the caucus' specifically-designated Reps. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, and James Banks, R-Ind.
title: Levin: Trump 'hater' McConnell should not be Senate GOP leader
